source: TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_SEQ_00<tab>Gerolt has the air of a man defeated.

TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_SEQ_01<tab>Gerolt has reluctantly agreed to lend his expertise to the restoration of a legendary arm of yore. For the first step, the weaponsmith bids you venture to the Sapsa Spawning Grounds in western La Noscea to retrieve a copy of the <var 1A 02 /var>Omnilex<var 1A 01 /var>. Search for a vessel in which the valuable relic might be kept.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_SEQ_02<tab>You have obtained a timeworn copy of the <var 1A 02 /var>Omnilex<var 1A 01 /var>. Make your way back to Hyrstmill and present the relic to Gerolt.

TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_SEQ_03<tab>According to Gerolt, the restoration process involves merging the old with the new─that is, embedding the original relic in a new host weapon. To this end, you must bring him an erudite's picatrix of healing melded with two grade three quicktongue materia.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_SEQ_03<tab>По словам Герольта, процесс восстановления включает в себя слияние старого с новым, то есть встраивание оригинальной реликвии в новое оружие. Для этого вы должны принести ему «Пикатрикс целителя», соединенный с двумя «Материями быстрого языка» третьего класса.

source:
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_SEQ_04<tab>You have delivered the materia-enhanced erudite's picatrix of healing to Gerolt. The weaponsmith next directs you to go to the Weeping Saint in the Coerthas central highlands, and obtain alumina salts from the dhorme chimera.

※The dhorme chimera can be confronted via the Duty Finder upon examining the quest destination.
※This objective must be completed as a scholar.
target:
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_SEQ_04<tab>Вы доставили Герольду усиленный материей «Пикатрикс целителя». Далее оружейник велел вам отправиться в Слёзы святого Даниффена в Центральном нагорье Кёртаса и добыть «Глинозёмные соли» у Дорм-химеры.

※С химерой можно встретиться через Поиск миссий, сперва исследовав место назначения в задании.
※Это задание должно быть выполнено профессией «Учёный».

source: TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_SEQ_05<tab>You have painstakingly obtained the pinch of alumina salts. Make your way back to Hyrstmill and deliver it to Gerolt.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_SEQ_05<tab>Вы кропотливо добыли щепотку «Глинозёмных солей». Вернитесь в Хёрстмилл и доставьте их Герольту.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_SEQ_06<tab>Using the alumina salts you brought him, Gerolt adds the finishing touches to your relic weapon. Even as he declares his work over, however, the man believes that there is still something incomplete about it. In order to shed light upon the mystery, Gerolt suggests that you seek out literature surrounding the heroes associated with the relic. Perhaps the trader Rowena back at Revenant's Toll will be able to assist you in this endeavor.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_SEQ_06<tab>Используя «Глиноземные соли», которые вы ему принесли, Герольт вносит последние штрихи в ваше реликтовое оружие. Однако даже когда он объявляет свою работу законченной, он считает, что в ней всё ещё есть что-то незавершённое. Чтобы пролить свет на эту загадку, Герольт предлагает вам поискать литературу о герое, связанном с реликвией. Возможно, торговка Ровена в Скорбном Звоне сможет помочь вам в этом деле.

source:
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_SEQ_07<tab>You have consulted Rowena, who agrees to procure the literature you seek...for a price. For your part of the deal, you must obtain for her an Amdapor glyph. Make your way through Amdapor Keep in the South Shroud, and procure this artifact.

※Amdapor Keep can be accessed via the Duty Finder.
※This objective must be completed as a scholar.
target:
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_SEQ_07<tab>Вы посоветовались с Ровеной, и она согласилась достать литературу, которую вы ищете... за определённую плату. За свою часть сделки вы должны раздобыть для неё «Амдапорский глиф». Пройдите через Амдапорскую крепость в Южной роще и найдите этот артефакт.

※В Амдапорскую крепость можно попасть через Поиск миссий.
※Это задание необходимо выполнить в качестве «Учёного».

source: TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_SEQ_08<tab>You have successfully obtained an Amdapor glyph. Make your way back to Revenant's Toll and deliver it to Rowena.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_SEQ_08<tab>Вы успешно получили «Амдапорский глиф». Вернитесь в Скорбный Звон и передайте его Ровене.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_SEQ_09<tab>You give the Amdapor glyph to Rowena, who upholds her promise and furnishes you a copy of <var 1A 02 /var>War of the Magi<var 1A 01 /var>. You now possess literature on the heroes who once wielded the relic weapon. Gerolt the weaponsmith will be keen to peruse it.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_SEQ_09<tab>Вы отдаёте Ровене «Амдапорский глиф», которая выполняет своё обещание и дарит вам копию <var 1A 02 /var>Война Магов<var 1A 01 /var>. Теперь у вас есть литература о герое, который когда-то владел реликтовым оружием. Оружейник Герольт с интересом ознакомится с ней.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_SEQ_10<tab>After a cursory examination of the text, Gerolt declares that he will require some time to make sense of its contents. In the meantime, you are to familiarize yourself with the restored weapon in its current state. Arm yourself with the unfinished copy of the <var 1A 02 /var>Omnilex<var 1A 01 /var>, make your way to the Sapsa Spawning Grounds in western La Noscea, and there slay eight Sapsa shelfspine, eight Sapsa shelfclaw, and eight Sapsa shelftooth.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_SEQ_11<tab>You have defeated the specified Sahagin. Return to Hyrstmill and report your success to Gerolt.

TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_SEQ_12<tab>Upon your return, Gerolt deduces that you must face mightier adversaries if you are to experience a revelation pertaining to your relic. To this end, he bids you challenge the hydra within Halatali, the abandoned training grounds situated in eastern Thanalan. Armed with the unfinished copy of the <var 1A 02 /var>Omnilex<var 1A 01 /var>, enter Halatali and defeat the hydra.

※The hydra can be confronted via the Duty Finder upon examining the quest destination.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_SEQ_13<tab>You have overcome the hydra. Take word of your accomplishment back to Gerolt at Hyrstmill.

TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_SEQ_14<tab>Combining information gleaned from the text with your firsthand experience, Gerolt has ascertained what must be done next. Hand over the unfinished copy of the <var 1A 02 /var>Omnilex<var 1A 01 /var> to the weaponsmith.

TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_SEQ_15<tab>Gerolt declares that but one step remains in the restoration. In order to create the raging fire that he needs, the weaponsmith bids you fetch him a white-hot ember, a howling gale, and a chunk of hyperfused ore. The first of these can be obtained by defeating Ifrit within the Bowl of Embers (Hard).

※The Bowl of Embers (Hard) can be accessed via the Duty Finder.
※This objective must be completed as a scholar.

TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_SEQ_16<tab>You have extinguished the Lord of the Inferno and obtained a white-hot ember. Next, take on Garuda in the Howling Eye (Hard) and defeat her to obtain a howling gale.

※The Howling Eye (Hard) can be accessed via the Duty Finder.
※This objective must be completed as a scholar.

TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_SEQ_17<tab>You have silenced the Lady of the Vortex and obtained a howling gale. Next, take on Titan in the Navel (Hard) and defeat him to obtain a chunk of hyperfused ore.

※The Navel (Hard) can be accessed via the Duty Finder.
※This objective must be completed as a scholar.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_SEQ_18<tab>You have buried the Lord of Crags and obtained a chunk of hyperfused ore. Deliver it along with the white-hot ember and the howling gale to Gerolt.

TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_SEQ_19<tab>You have delivered the three items Gerolt requires to create a raging fire. Now he only wants for a bottle of Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han quenching oil to complete the restoration of your relic. Obtain this item and deliver it to the weaponsmith.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_SEQ_19<tab>Вы доставили три предмета, необходимых Герольту для создания бушующего огня. Теперь ему нужна только бутылка «Закалочного масла Радз-ат-Хан», чтобы завершить восстановление вашей реликвии. Приобретите этот предмет и отнесите его оружейнику.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_SEQ_20<tab>You have delivered the bottle of Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han quenching oil to Gerolt, who promptly sees to the final stage of the restoration process. After no small amount of effort and perseverance, you are now the proud owner of a copy of the <var 1A 02 /var>Omnilex<var 1A 01 /var>. May it serve you well in your adventures to come!
target: TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_SEQ_20<tab>Вы передали Герольту бутылку «Закалочного масла Радз-ат-Хан», и он незамедлительно приступил к завершающей стадии процесса реставрации. После немалых усилий и настойчивости вы стали гордым владельцем рукописи «Омнилекс». Пусть она сослужит вам хорошую службу в ваших будущих приключениях!

source: TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_SEQ_21<tab>
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_SEQ_22<tab>
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_SEQ_23<tab>
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_TODO_00<tab>Obtain a timeworn copy of the <var 1A 02 /var>Omnilex<var 1A 01 /var> from a treasure coffer in the Sapsa Spawning Grounds.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the timeworn copy of the <var 1A 02 /var>Omnilex<var 1A 01 /var> to Gerolt.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_TODO_02<tab>Deliver a materia-enhanced erudite's picatrix of healing to Gerolt.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_TODO_02<tab>Доставьте Герольту «Пикатрикс целителя», усиленный материей.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_TODO_03<tab>Examine the destination at the Weeping Saint and, as a scholar, use the Duty Finder to complete the trial “A Relic Reborn: The Chimera.”
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_TODO_04<tab>Deliver the alumina salts to Gerolt.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_TODO_04<tab>Доставьте «Глиноземные соли» Герольту.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_TODO_05<tab>Speak with Rowena at Revenant's Toll.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_TODO_06<tab>Obtain an Amdapor glyph by completing Amdapor Keep as a scholar.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_TODO_06<tab>Получите «Амдапорский глиф», пройдя Амдапорскую крепость «Учёным».

source: TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_TODO_07<tab>Deliver the Amdapor glyph to Rowena.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_TODO_07<tab>Доставьте «Амдапорский глиф» Ровене.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_TODO_08<tab>Deliver the copy of <var 1A 02 /var>War of the Magi<var 1A 01 /var> to Gerolt.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_TODO_08<tab>Передайте копию <var 1A 02 /var>Война Магов<var 1A 01 /var> Герольту.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_TODO_09<tab>Slay Sapsa shelfspine while equipped with the unfinished copy of the <var 1A 02 /var>Omnilex<var 1A 01 /var>.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_TODO_10<tab>Slay Sapsa shelfclaw while equipped with the unfinished copy of the <var 1A 02 /var>Omnilex<var 1A 01 /var>.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_TODO_11<tab>Slay Sapsa shelftooth while equipped with the unfinished copy of the <var 1A 02 /var>Omnilex<var 1A 01 /var>.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_TODO_12<tab>Speak with Gerolt.

TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_TODO_13<tab>Examine the destination outside Halatali and, with the unfinished copy of the <var 1A 02 /var>Omnilex<var 1A 01 /var> equipped, use the Duty Finder to complete the trial “A Relic Reborn: The Hydra.”
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_TODO_14<tab>Speak with Gerolt.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_TODO_15<tab>Give the unfinished copy of the <var 1A 02 /var>Omnilex<var 1A 01 /var> to Gerolt.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_TODO_16<tab>Obtain a white-hot ember in the Bowl of Embers (Hard) as a scholar.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_TODO_17<tab>Obtain a howling gale in the Howling Eye (Hard) as a scholar.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_TODO_18<tab>Obtain a chunk of hyperfused ore in the Navel (Hard) as a scholar.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_TODO_19<tab>Deliver the requested items to Gerolt.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_TODO_20<tab>Deliver a bottle of Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han quenching oil to Gerolt.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_TODO_21<tab>
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_TODO_22<tab>
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_TODO_23<tab>

TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_000<tab>Jus' let me make one thing clear: it might be as I'm repairin' kettles to pay for yesterday's mead, but I still got me pride as a master weaponsmith. Ye'll get no less than the finest out of me forge.

TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_001<tab>An' it might be as ye've got that godsdamned slip of paper, but it'll only get ye so much. Restorin' relics like these calls for some rare ol' materials, an' I ain't got none. So if you want the job done, ye'll have to run along an' fetch 'em for me.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_002<tab>So, what is it ye want restored?

TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_003<tab>Fancy yerself a scholar, eh? Like one o' them as helped the nation o' Nym preserve its sovereignty durin' the War o' the Magi way back when? I know a bit about 'em, as it happens.

TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_004<tab>They were a right clever lot, those scholars. Thanks to their brilliant strategizin', the Nymians never failed to throw back would-be conquerors no matter how badly they were outnumbered. Like I always say, it ain't the size what matters, but how ye <var 1A 02 /var>use<var 1A 01 /var> it.

TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_005<tab>A-Ahem! Aaanyroad, 'tis a copy o' the <var 1A 02 /var>Omnilex<var 1A 01 /var> ye want, a right bleedin' rare grimoire what's supposed to contain <var 1A 02 /var>all<var 1A 01 /var> the military tactics ever conceived by man.

TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_006<tab>Unlucky for ye, though, they don't make 'em like they used to. Which is to say, <var 1A 02 /var>not anymore<var 1A 01 /var>. But if yer heart's set on a copy, ye might try rootin' about western La Noscea.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_007<tab>If I remember rightly, the Nymians used to have a port over there, but it's long since become a Sahagin lair─the Sapsa Spawnin' Grounds, 'tis called.

TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_010<tab>'Tis a copy o' the <var 1A 02 /var>Omnilex<var 1A 01 /var> ye want, a right bleedin' rare grimoire what's supposed to contain <var 1A 02 /var>all<var 1A 01 /var> the military tactics ever conceived by man.

TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_011<tab>Unlucky for ye, though, they don't make 'em like they used to. Which is to say, <var 1A 02 /var>not anymore<var 1A 01 /var>. But if yer heart's set on a copy, ye might try rootin' about western La Noscea.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_012<tab>If I remember rightly, the Nymians used to have a port over there, but it's long since become a Sahagin lair─the Sapsa Spawnin' Grounds, 'tis called.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_020<tab>Well, bugger me... Never in me wildest, drunkest dreams did I imagine ye'd actually find the bloody thing... Bah, so I'll have to fire up the forge, after all.

TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_021<tab>Havin' said that, the relic's in far worse shape than I thought. It ain't like to survive much poundin' in this state. Truth be told, I'd be worried about sneezin' near it.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_022<tab><sigh> We're gonna need a new host what'll give itself for the restoration.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_023<tab>Bring me an erudite's picatrix of healing, one with two grade three quicktongue materia melded to it. This'll serve as the vessel for the restored relic.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_023<tab>Принесите мне «Пикатрикс целителя», к которому прикреплены две «Материи быстрого языка» третьего класса. Он послужит сосудом для восстановления реликвии.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_024<tab>Remember, that's <var 1A 02 /var>two<var 1A 01 /var> grade three quicktongue materia. Aught less, an' ye'll get naught from me, no matter how many slips of paper ye wave in me face.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_024<tab>Вам нужно принести мне «Шепчущий жезл безумца», к которому прикреплены две «Материями быстрого языка» третьего класса. Он послужит сосудом для восстановления реликвии.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_030<tab>Ye need to bring me an erudite's picatrix of healing, one with two grade three quicktongue materia melded to it. This'll serve as the vessel for the restored relic.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_030<tab>Вам нужно принести мне «Пикатрикс целителя», к которому прикреплены две «Материи быстрого языка» третьего класса. Он послужит сосудом для восстановления реликвии.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_031<tab>Hm? Aye, I could hammer one out in me sleep, but then I could wipe yer arse without much trouble, an' I ain't plannin' on doin' that neither! Seems ye'll jus' have to do both yerself, eh?
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_040<tab>Ah, 'tis a fine base ye've brought me. Aye, jus' the thing to host yer relic.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_041<tab>I've merged what was left of the relic with the host weapon, so the groundwork's done. But don't go jumpin' for joy jus' yet─there's still more to do.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_042<tab>I need to work on the finishin' touches, but due to the reinforcement work I've had to do, the book's provin' rather stubborn to mend.

TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_043<tab>To get 'round this, we'll be needin' some alumina salts, a substance made by grindin' a rock called alumina into fine grains. Unlucky for ye, though, it ain't easy to get hold of.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_043<tab>Чтобы обойти это, нам понадобятся «Глиноземные соли» — вещество, получаемое путём перемалывания горной породы под названием глинозём в мелкие зёрна. Но, к несчастью для вас, это будет нелегко достать.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_044<tab>Mayhap ye already know this, but there's beasties out there what devour their prey whole. An' some of 'em swallow rocks so as to aid with digestion.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_045<tab>The dhorme chimera what terrorizes the central highlands o' Coerthas happens to swallow alumina salts for this purpose.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_045<tab>Дорм-химера, терроризирующая Центральные нагорья Кёртаса, как раз использует «глинозёмные соли» для своего атакующего дыхания.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_046<tab>Slay the bugger an' bring me the alumina salts, an' I'll see to the finishin' touches on yer weapon.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_046<tab>Убей гада и принеси мне «Глиноземные соли», а я займусь отделкой твоего оружия.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_SYSTEM_000_047<tab>The dhorme chimera can be confronted via the Duty Finder upon examining the quest destination situated at the Weeping Saint in the Coerthas central highlands.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_SYSTEM_000_048<tab>Please note that the trial “A Relic Reborn: The Chimera” must be completed as a scholar.

TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_050<tab>Jus' a dozen more kettles, then it's off to the tav─
<var 1A 02 /var>You<var 1A 01 /var> again!? What in the seven hells do ye want this time!?
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_051<tab>Forgotten what to bring, eh? Gods' sake, <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var>, ye've got the memory of a bleedin' whatsit!
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_052<tab>Slay the dhorme chimera an' bring me alumina salts, an' I'll see to the finishin' touches on yer weapon.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_052<tab>Убей Дорм-химеру и принеси мне «Глиноземные соли», а я пока позабочусь о завершении работы над твоим оружием.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_SYSTEM_000_053<tab>The dhorme chimera can be confronted via the Duty Finder upon examining the quest destination situated at the Weeping Saint in the Coerthas central highlands.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_SYSTEM_000_054<tab>Please note that the trial “A Relic Reborn: The Chimera” must be completed as a scholar.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_060<tab>...An' o' course, the adventurer comes back triumphant. <sigh> Should've bloody known not even the chimera would be able to put ye out o' me misery.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_061<tab>Hand over those alumina salts, an' I'll get right to work.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_061<tab>Передайте «Глиноземные соли», и я приступлю к работе.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_062<tab>There, the deed's done. I've squeezed out every onze of me skill to restore yer weapon, an' I think ye'll agree it looks the part.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_063<tab>Yet there's summat...missin' somehow, though I'm buggered if I know what. The piece jus' lacks a certain <var 1A 02 /var>glow<var 1A 01 /var>, as it were.

TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_064<tab>We need to learn more about the relic. Literature surroundin' the heroes associated with it would be a fine place to begin...but I ain't exactly a scholarly an' haven't the slightest inklin' where to get me hands on such stuff.

TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_065<tab>As much as I hate to say this, Rowena's probably the one to talk to. Thing is, I'd sooner shove hot kettles up me arse sideways than owe that thrice-damned harridan another debt.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_066<tab>Yer gonna have to make yerself useful once again. Take yerself to Rowena an' ask for her help, an' return here once ye've learned summat what might be of use.

TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_ROWENA_000_070<tab>You're lookin' a bit more run-down than before. Your dealin's with Gerolt takin' their toll? Actually, forget I even asked. My mouth tastes o' bile if I so much as <var 1A 02 /var>think<var 1A 01 /var> o' that sorry specimen. So, is there somethin' you need?
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_ROWENA_000_071<tab>...Literature on the heroes of old who once wielded your weapon?
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_ROWENA_000_072<tab>Hm, I reckon I can find what you need. Might take a bit o' time, is all.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_ROWENA_000_073<tab>'Course, this ain't a charity I'm runnin' here. I can get you what you want, but you'll have to do likewise for me.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_ROWENA_000_074<tab>I'll track down literature on the military scholars of old.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_ROWENA_000_075<tab>For your part, you're to bring me an Amdapor glyph. You'll find this inside Amdapor Keep, a ruined castle situated in the South Shroud.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_ROWENA_000_075<tab>Со своей стороны, вы должны принести мне «Амдапорский глиф». Вы сможете найти его в разрушенной Амдапорской крепости, расположенной в Южной роще.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_ROWENA_000_076<tab>Clear on the deal? Then run along and fulfill your part of it.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_ROWENA_000_080<tab>Ah, good <var 08 E905 ((on you)) ((lad)) /var>! This is exactly what I was after. You've honored your part o' the bargain, and so I'll do the same.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_090<tab>Back to pester me so soon? Judgin' from that smirk on yer face, I take it ye've found what ye need?
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_091<tab>Aye, this text is about the military scholars of old, all right. But gods, would it have killed the bugger that wrote it to use normal bloody words!?

TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_092<tab>It'll take me bleedin' <var 1A 02 /var>moons<var 1A 01 /var> to get through this lot─time I could be spendin' on kettles! Gah...while I try to make head or tail of it all, why don't ye take this here unfinished <var 1A 02 /var>Omnilex<var 1A 01 /var> an' try it out?
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_093<tab>As I mentioned before, it's still missin' summat, but it's all there shape-wise, meanin' it should serve ye jus' fine as an ordinary weapon.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_094<tab>Seein' as yer a ripe ol' scholar, mayhap ye'll be able to feel out exactly what it wants for.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_095<tab>That's to say, get out there an' fight some nasty foes, as the scholars who went afore ye must've done back in the day.

TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_096<tab>The Sapsa Spawning Grounds over in western La Noscea oughta serve yer needs. Pit yerself against some Sapsa shelfspine, shelfclaw, an' shelftooth─eight of each, say─then come back an' tell me what ye've gleaned.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_097<tab>With the information in the text an' yer firsthand experience, I reckon we'll solve this puzzle yet.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_100<tab>I want ye to get out there an' fight some nasty foes, as the scholars who went afore ye must've done back in the day.

TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_101<tab>The Sapsa Spawning Grounds over in western La Noscea oughta serve yer needs. Pit yerself against some Sapsa shelfspine, shelfclaw, an' shelftooth─eight of each, say─then come back an' tell me what ye've gleaned.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_EPICMOOGLE_000_105<tab>You mustn't lose your relic, kupo! I went to great pains to retrieve it, so promise me you'll take better care of it!
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_110<tab>Back already? By the frown yer wearin', I take it ye've got nothin' to show for yer time with the fishbacks.

TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_111<tab>Hmmm, might be as ye want for better sport. An' I know jus' the creature what'll give it to ye─the hydra what reigns over the fiends within Halatali. A nasty piece of work, that. Try not to piss yer britches when ye see it.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_SYSTEM_000_112<tab>The hydra can be confronted via the Duty Finder upon examining the quest destination situated by the entrance to Halatali in eastern Thanalan.

TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_SYSTEM_000_113<tab>Please note that the trial “A Relic Reborn: The Hydra” must be completed while equipped with the unfinished copy of the <var 1A 02 /var>Omnilex<var 1A 01 /var>.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_FAFAJONI_000_120<tab>We Immortal Flames have managed to cull most of the feral denizens of Halatali, but the hydra still remains. Frankly, we're out of our─

TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_FAFAJONI_000_121<tab>What!? You mean to face the fell creature!? To be sure, we would be grateful if you could rid us of it, but I must warn you of the dangers. Survival is <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> guaranteed.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_SYSTEM_000_125<tab>In order to challenge the hydra, you must be equipped with the unfinished copy of the <var 1A 02 /var>Omnilex<var 1A 01 /var>.

TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_130<tab>Bloody hells, not ye again! Can't a man have a moment's bleedin' rest!? I've barely had time to <var 1A 02 /var>piss<var 1A 01 /var> since you gave me that damnable text.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_131<tab>Readin' the thing's given me a fierce bloody headache...which yer makin' worse by houndin' me!
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_132<tab>Do me a favor an' make yerself scarce, will ye? Go an' play with yer bloody <var 1A 02 /var>Omnilex<var 1A 01 /var> or summat.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_EPICMOOGLE_000_135<tab>You mustn't lose your relic, kupo! I went to great pains to retrieve it, so promise me you'll take better care of it!

TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_140<tab>Yer... Yer still alive! Why the hells do you adventurers have to be so godsdamned sturdy!? I was bloody <var 1A 02 /var>sure<var 1A 01 /var> ye'd be hydra dung by now... <sigh>

TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_141<tab>But what's done is done...or in this case, <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> done. Anyroad, let's talk about that text ye brought. It contains accounts o' the major clashes what took place durin' the War o' the Magi.

TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_142<tab>The entry on the Battle o' the Gods' Grip jumped out at me. This was when the Nymians took the Amdapori host by surprise as it made its beach landin'─takin' the siege to the besiegers, as it were.

TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_143<tab>As they're wont to do, the scholars played a key role in the victory, though that didn't interest me near as much as the passage what touched on the <var 1A 02 /var>Omnilex<var 1A 01 /var>.

TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_144<tab>Turns out the patterns on the cover are meant to improve the flow of aether from the wielder's hands. An' I'd thought 'em merely decorations. Ye learn summat new every day, eh?

TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_146<tab>As ye can see, I've done me research. I trust ye've also been pullin' yer weight, puttin' the relic to use like I said. Well, go on, then─tell me what ye've learned.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_147<tab>Is that so? Aye...I'd wondered about that.

TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_148<tab>Based on what we've gleaned from the text an' yer firsthand experience, I'll rework the relic so as to improve yer affinity with it. Hand it over for a second, will ye?
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_EPICMOOGLE_000_149<tab>You mustn't lose your relic, kupo! I went to great pains to retrieve it, so promise me you'll take better care of it!

TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_150<tab>Based on what we've gleaned from the text an' yer firsthand experience, I'll rework the relic so as to improve yer affinity with it. Hand it over for a second, will ye?
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_151<tab>There, the deed's done. That leaves us with one last step.

TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_152<tab>That is, fully mergin' the old relic, the new host, an' the soul of the bearer─aye, that's <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>. Only then can the weapon be restored to its former glory.

TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_153<tab>But to do this, I need a fire what's hotter than the seventh hell. An' to keep such a fire alive an' ragin', I need a wind what's fiercer than the...than the...er, hangover I had last week. Gah, ye know what I mean!

TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_154<tab>Jus' get me a white-hot ember, a howlin' gale, an' a chunk o' hyperfused ore, an' I'll finish yer bloody weapon! Ah, an' I need me a bottle o' Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han quenchin' oil as well to cool it off!

TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_SYSTEM_000_155<tab>The white-hot ember, the howling gale, and the chunk of hyperfused ore can be obtained by defeating Ifrit in the Bowl of Embers (Hard), Garuda in the Howling Eye (Hard), and Titan in the Navel (Hard), respectively.

TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_SYSTEM_000_156<tab>The bottle of Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han quenching oil can be obtained by exchanging 15 <var 31 ((Item)) 04 ((　28)) 0302 /var> with Auriana, one of Rowena's assistants at Revenant's Toll.

TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_160<tab>In order to restore yer weapon to its former glory, we need to fully merge the relic with the new host. Oh, aye─an' yer soul. Don't worry, though─it might not hurt much.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_161<tab>Get me a white-hot ember, a howlin' gale, an' a chunk of hyperfused ore, an' I'll finish yer bloody weapon.

TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_SYSTEM_000_162<tab>The white-hot ember, the howling gale, and the chunk of hyperfused ore can be obtained by defeating Ifrit in the Bowl of Embers (Hard), Garuda in the Howling Eye (Hard), and Titan in the Navel (Hard), respectively.

TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_SYSTEM_000_163<tab>The bottle of Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han quenching oil can be obtained by exchanging 15 <var 31 ((Item)) 04 ((　28)) 0302 /var> with Auriana, one of Rowena's assistants at Revenant's Toll.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_170<tab>So yer back... Never doubted for a second ye'd trounce all three primals an' come back to pester me again.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_171<tab>All right, then, let's see the white-hot ember, the howling gale, an' the hyperfused ore.

TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_172<tab>Aye, these oughta get me the levels o' heat I need. Which leaves just the Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han quenchin' oil for coolin' things off afterwards. Ye've got that, too, I assume?

TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_SYSTEM_100_172<tab>The bottle of Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han quenching oil can be obtained by exchanging 15 <var 31 ((Item)) 04 ((　28)) 0302 /var> with Auriana, one of Rowena's assistants at Revenant's Toll.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_173<tab>Ye've done yer part, an' so I'll do mine.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_174<tab>Watch now, an' try not to bat yer eyelids─ain't every day ye get to see a relic reborn!

TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_175<tab>Muahahaha... MUAHAHAHAHAHA! These gods-given hands've worked yet another miracle! Feast yer eyes on the <var 1A 02 /var>Omnilex<var 1A 01 /var>, jus' as it was in days of yore! 'Tis a sight to move a man to tears...ye lucky bastard. Ye'd better bloody well take care of it!
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_SYSTEM_000_200<tab>In order to progress further in the quest, you must complete the objectives of Amdapor Keep.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_SYSTEM_000_201<tab>In order to gain access to Amdapor Keep, you must complete the quest “Ghosts of Amdapor.”
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_SYSTEM_000_202<tab>In order to progress further in the quest, you must complete the objectives of the Bowl of Embers (Hard).
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_SYSTEM_000_203<tab>Please note that gaining access to the Bowl of Embers (Hard) requires that you make sufficient progress in the main scenario.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_SYSTEM_000_204<tab>In order to progress further in the quest, you must complete the objectives of the Howling Eye (Hard).
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_SYSTEM_000_205<tab>Please note that gaining access to the Howling Eye (Hard) requires that you make sufficient progress in the main scenario.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_SYSTEM_000_206<tab>In order to progress further in the quest, you must complete the objectives of the Navel (Hard).
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_SYSTEM_000_207<tab>Please note that gaining access to the Navel (Hard) requires that you make sufficient progress in the main scenario.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_GEROLT_000_210<tab>Gods, I've been dry as a bone for the past six bells. M-Mead... Jus' give me enough mead to wet me lips...

TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_SYSTEM_000_211<tab>Please note that you can only undertake one “A Relic Reborn” quest at any given time. If you wish to acquire a different relic weapon, you must either complete or abandon the current quest.
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_QIB_TODO001<tab>Defeat the dhorme chimera!
TEXT_JOBSCH001_01127_QIB_TODO002<tab>Defeat the hydra!
